results.abstract: Insomnia, drowsiness and brain fog can all take some of the fun out of your first few days in a faraway place. You can’t avoid jet lag, but you can follow some tips to bounce back faster.

results.title: Planning to Visit Barcelona or Dubrovnik? It’s Going to Cost You.
results.abstract: Driven by the climate crisis, the post-pandemic surge in visitors and a growing interest in making tourism work for local communities, European cities are finding new ways to tax visitors.

results.title: For the First Time, There’s a Pill for Postpartum Depression
results.abstract: Because the pill works faster than other antidepressants and is taken for only two weeks, it may encourage more treatment of the debilitating condition.
